actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The aboleth makes three tentacle attacks.

save.onFail: Diseased as per Aboleth tentacle; can breathe only underwater after 1 minute

actions.name: Enslave (3/Day)
actions.description: One creature within 30 ft. must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom save or be magically charmed (as per aboleth); repeat save when damaged or 1 mile away.

legendaryActions.name: Detect
legendaryActions.description: The aboleth makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendaryActions.name: Tail Swipe
legendaryActions.description: The aboleth makes one tail attack.

legendaryActions.name: Psychic Drain
legendaryActions.description: One charmed creature takes 10 (3d6) psychic damage; the aboleth regains hit points equal to the damage dealt.
